title: http.Post stress test fails
body:
This test has two parts: a simple python web server, and a go web client 
that uses http.Post:
http://pastie.org/841123

The python web server takes the post data and returns it in JSON format. 

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
The output is very choppy. I'm inclined to believe that there is a glitch 
with Go's ReadResponse. 

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux/amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
release-02-24

Please provide any additional information below.
I wanted to create an issue to track it. It might not be a bug in Go, but 
something strange is happening.
